name: Hover Bots VR
description: Hover Bots VR lets you experience the freedom of flying like never before! Hop on your hover board and fly through the city chasing robotic flying birds. Experience what Harry Potter felt during Quidditch. Your goal is to fly around the city and catch robotic birds with your web gun.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2.2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB DirectX: Version 8.0a Storage: 500 MB available space
